title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor design director on starting production in Covid-19 lockdown and still finishing in record time: 'I don't know how we did it'
description: Games are taking longer than ever to finish, but Respawn managed to make Jedi Survivor in just three years.

title: I knew Capcom was doing pretty well, but its stock is skyrocketing

title: Activision settles esports salary cap lawsuit with Department of Justice
description: The proposed settlement caps off an investigation that began in 2021.

title: 'Free' Ark: Survival Evolved upgrade turns out not to be free, and a lot of players are mad
description: Ark: Survival Ascended, as the UE5 version is known, will cost $50, and will be the only version with official server support when it launches.

title: It's a great week for city builders: 3 new ones are coming to Steam on Wednesday alone

title: The RTX 4070 just leaked, looks like a match for an RTX 3080 without frame gen
